description: A humorous take on the famous seafood diet joke, showcasing the playful interaction between Sam and Riley at a seafood restaurant.
title: Seafood Delight
n_1: Sam and Riley sit in a cozy seafood restaurant, menus in hand.
n_2: Sam points excitedly at a dish on the menu.
n_3: Sam eagerly grabs a shrimp from the freshly served dish.
n_4: Both burst into laughter, enjoying the meal and the joke.
c1_1: Look at this! They have grilled shrimp.
c2_1: You're really taking your seafood diet seriously, huh?
c1_2: This is my kind of diet!
c2_3: You see food, and you eat!
